title: Esben Lykke
text:
My name is Esben. I’m currenctly doing a PhD in exercise epidemiology where I’m working to develop machine learned models for use in accelerometry data. Primarily to classify non-wear time and sleep to provide objective and robust estimates of sleep quality on population basis. Take a look around this site to see some of the stuff I use my time on.


2023 | PhD in exercise epidemiology
2017 | MS in sports science, human physiology
2014 | BS in sports science



2018 - 2019 | Research assistant, Department of Sport Science, Aarhus University
2019 | Research Assistant, Department of Sports Science and Clinical Biomechanics, University of Southern Denmark
For a detailed overview of my educational background and experience see my cv (coming very soon).

title: Drought Index Around the World
text: This was a project to practice reproducible research using snakemake, mamba and github actions. Check out the site here.

title: Publications
text:
Machine Learned Models for Estimating Sleep Quality Metrics Using Free-Living Accelerometer Data in Comparison to an EEG-based Sleep Tracking Device(working title…)
Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Jan Christian Brønd et al.
2023 | In midst of writing the manuscript.
Generalizability and performance of methods to detect non-wear with free-living accelerometer recordings  (Download PDF)
Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Malthe Roswall, Niels Christian Møller, Anders Grøntved & Jan Christian Brønd
2022 | Scientific Reports, 13, Article number: 2496 (2023)
Manual annotation of time in bed using free-living recordings of accelerometry data  (Download PDF)
Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Jesper Pedersen, Niels Christian Møller, Anders Grøntved & Jan Christian Brønd
2021 | Sensors (ISSN 1424-8220) on 14 December 2021
Recommendations for determining the validity of consumer wearable heart rate devices: expert statement and checklist of the INTERLIVE Network  (Download PDF)
Jan M. Mühlen, Julie Stang, Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Pedro B. Judice, Pablo Molina-Garcia, William Johnston, Luís B. Sardinha, Francisco B. Ortega, Brian Caulfield, Wilhelm Bloch, Sulin Cheng, Ulf Ekelund, Jan Christian Brønd, Anders Grøntved, Moritz Schumann
2020 | British Journal of Sports Medicine. 55, 14, s. 767-779
Recommendations for determining the validity of consumer wearable and smartphone step count: Expert statement and checklist of the INTERLIVE network  (Download PDF)
William Johnston, Pedro B. Judice, Pablo Molina García, Jan M. Mühlen, Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Julie Stang, Moritz Schumann, Shulin Cheng, Wilhelm Bloch, Jan Christian Brønd, Ulf Ekelund, Anders Grøntved, Brian Caulfield, Francisco B. Ortega & Luis B. Sardinha
2020 | British Journal of Sports Medicine. 55, 14, s. 780-793
Unprompted vigorous physical activity is associated with higher levels of subsequent sedentary behaviour in participants with low cardiorespiratory fitness (Not open access)
Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Kirstine Obling, Helle Terkildsen Maindal, Cuno Rasmussen, & Kristian Overgaard
2019 | European Journal of Sport Science. 19, 7, s. 1004-1013
The Applicability of Thigh-Worn vs. Hip-Worn ActiGraph Accelerometers During Walking and Running  (Not open access)
Esben Lykke Skovgaard, Katja Krustrup Pedersen, Ryan Larsen, Mikkel Stengaard, Søren Sørensen, & Kristian Overgaard
2019 | Journal for the Measurement of Physical Behaviour. 2, 4, s. 209-217
